snippet: The stars appear to be aligning for the Denver Broncos in their quest for a second Super Bowl appearance in three years, but big questions remain as the AFC's top seed heads into Sunday’s Divisional playoff game against Pittsburgh....
lead_paragraph: The stars appear to be aligning for the Denver Broncos in their quest for a second Super Bowl appearance in three years, but big questions remain as the AFC's top seed heads into Sunday’s Divisional playoff game against Pittsburgh.

headline.main: Can Denver QB Mningan Outscore Injury-Hit Steelers?
headline.print_headline: Can Denver QB Mningan Outscore Injury-Hit Steelers?
